cause.description:
The India Rural Development Fund (www.indiarural.org) with its Indian partner (www.rdfindia.org) started by helping establish a single school in Kalleda Village in the Southern Indian State of Andhra Pradesh.
10 Years later, they expanded to more than 5 schools with more than 2000 students.
Besides the excellent education progress in these schools (www.rdfindia.org/education.htm), the schools have also produced international level archers.
More about the schools and the foundation at - http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/south_asia/6332511.stm?ls http://www.flickr.com/photos/kalledaphotoproject
